column4: hi, i'm trying to compile a driver (http://sourceforge.net/projects/video-2-1394/) but it fails because it wants to include ieee1394_core.h and a few other headers, which i can't find in the linux-headers-generic package (but can in the kernel source package)
i'm kinda new to kernel/driver compilation; does this mean the kernel package wasn't compiled with that driver?
did you install the kernel source?
